GapFillInput.Title: Defining relative clauses
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a relative pronoun or (who, that, which, whose, where, when) in each gap. If it is possible to leave out the relative pronoun you can type – .

Content.Question:
1. A parking meter is a machine which|that|- you put money into when you park your car.
2. A neighbour is someone who|that lives next door to you or near you.
3. Sunday’s the day when we usually relax.
4. A hobby is an activity which|that|- you enjoy doing in your free time.
5. A firefighter is someone whose job it is to stop fires burning.
6. A toaster is a machine which|that is used to make toast.
7. A resort is a place where a lot of people go for a holiday.
8. An acquaintance is someone who|- you know but do not know well.
9. A souvenir is an object which|that is kept to remind you of a special place.
10. A factory is a building where things are produced in large quantities.
11. A widow is a woman whose husband has died.
12. A day off is a day when you do not go to work because it is a holiday or because you are sick.
